definition: to stay somewhere temporarily/to stop over
to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve

sentences.english: However, the present recognition of TV essays still remains on the text-oriented level.
sentences.chinese: 但當前對電視散文的認識仍然停留在文本主導論層次。

sentences.english: For first 3 days leave overnight as mask.
You have a layover in Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 你要在芝加哥作短暫停留。

sentences.english: Could you stay for me, even just a moment?
sentences.chinese: 你可願爲我停留，哪怕只是片刻？

sentences.english: Will we be staying overnight in Hongkong?
sentences.chinese: 我們要在香港停留一夜嗎？

sentences.english: Your opinion of T-Mac is about 4 years past due .
sentences.chinese: 你關於麥迪的觀點是還停留在4年前。

sentences.english: The bus sometimes stops at a drive-in.
sentences.chinese: 有時候這巴士停留在簡易餐館。

sentences.english: Alert Bay is also the first marina we have stopped at that is truly affordable on our budget.
sentences.chinese: 阿樂灣也是我們停留的碼頭中最符合我們預算的。

sentences.english: We stopped at the Keelung night market before returning home.
sentences.chinese: 我們回家前還在基隆夜市停留了一下。

sentences.english: There are always some beggars dressed in filthly clothes hanging around the subway stations.
sentences.chinese: 在地鐵車站總有一些穿戴邋遢衣服的要飯的人停留。

sentences.english: You can also stay in Downward Dog for a breath and then raise into One leg Downward Dog .
sentences.chinese: 你也可以在下犬式停留一個呼吸然後進入單腿下犬式。

sentences.english: In the happy forest I will forever dwell.
sentences.chinese: 在快活林，我將永遠停留。

sentences.english: Stay on the edge of the world, and goodbye.
sentences.chinese: 停留在世界邊緣，與之惜別。

sentences.english: But now we have to execute, not only say the words.
sentences.chinese: 但我們要付諸實施，不能停留在口頭上。

sentences.english: His work remains mathematically in the realm of ordinary differential equations.
sentences.chinese: 他的工作在數學上就停留在常微分方程的範圍。

sentences.english: The earth belongs to anyone who stops for a moment, gazes and goes on his way.
sentences.chinese: 地球屬於那些停留片刻，凝視它，然後繼續趕路的人。

definition: to stay/to remain/to linger/(computing) to reside/resident (program etc)
to fix/to confine to/freeze frame/stop motion (filmmaking)
to dither/to hesitate/to pace back and forth/by ext. to hover around/to linger
to remember/to bear in mind/to learn by heart
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
to separate oneself from/to break away from/diastasis (medicine)/abscission/abjunction (botany)
